Detailed Description

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Creature()

Creature::Creature ( bool  isWorldObject = false)
explicit
271 : Unit(isWorldObject), MovableMapObject(), m_groupLootTimer(0), lootingGroupLowGUID(0), m_lootRecipientGroup(0),
272 m_corpseRemoveTime(0), m_respawnTime(0), m_respawnDelay(300), m_corpseDelay(60), m_wanderDistance(0.0f), m_boundaryCheckTime(2500),
273 m_transportCheckTimer(1000), lootPickPocketRestoreTime(0), m_combatPulseTime(0), m_combatPulseDelay(0), m_reactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE), m_defaultMovementType(IDLE_MOTION_TYPE),
274 m_spawnId(0), m_equipmentId(0), m_originalEquipmentId(0), m_AlreadyCallAssistance(false),
275 m_AlreadySearchedAssistance(false), m_regenHealth(true), m_regenPower(true), m_AI_locked(false), m_meleeDamageSchoolMask(SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL), m_originalEntry(0), m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled(false), m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled(false),
276 m_homePosition(), m_transportHomePosition(), m_creatureInfo(nullptr), m_creatureData(nullptr), m_detectionDistance(20.0f), m_waypointID(0), m_path_id(0), m_formation(nullptr), m_lastLeashExtensionTime(nullptr), m_cannotReachTimer(0),

◆ _IsTargetAcceptable()

bool Creature::_IsTargetAcceptable ( Unit const *  target) const
2558{
2559 ASSERT(target);
2560
2561 // if the target cannot be attacked, the target is not acceptable
2562 if (IsFriendlyTo(target) || !target->isTargetableForAttack(false, this) || (m_vehicle && (IsOnVehicle(target) || m_vehicle->GetBase()->IsOnVehicle(target))))
2563 return false;
2564
2565 if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_DIED))
2566 {
2567 // some creatures can detect fake death
2568 if (CanIgnoreFeignDeath() && target->HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH))
2569 return true;
2570 else
2571 return false;
2572 }
2573
2574 Unit const* targetVictim = target->getAttackerForHelper();
2575
2576 // if I'm already fighting target, or I'm hostile towards the target, the target is acceptable
2577 if (IsEngagedBy(target) || IsHostileTo(target))
2578 return true;
2579
2580 // if the target's victim is friendly, and the target is neutral, the target is acceptable
2581 if (targetVictim && !IsNeutralToAll() && IsFriendlyTo(targetVictim))
2582 return true;
2583
2584 // if the target's victim is not friendly, or the target is friendly, the target is not acceptable
2585 return false;
2586}
ASSERT
#define ASSERT
Definition: Errors.h:68
UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH
@ UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH
Definition: UnitDefines.h:268

◆ AddSpellCooldown()

void Creature::AddSpellCooldown ( uint32  spell_id,
uint32  ,
uint32  end_time,
bool  needSendToClient = false,
bool  forceSendToSpectator = false 
)
overridevirtual

Reimplemented from Unit.

2861{
2862 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
2863 if (!spellInfo)
2864 return;
2865
2866 // used in proc system, otherwise normal creature cooldown
2867 if (end_time)
2868 {
2869 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, end_time);
2870 return;
2871 }
2872
2873 uint32 spellcooldown = spellInfo->RecoveryTime;
2874 uint32 categoryId = spellInfo->GetCategory();
2875 uint32 categorycooldown = categoryId ? spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime : 0;
2876 if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
2877 {
2878 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, spellcooldown);
2879 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, categorycooldown);
2880 }
2881
2882 SpellCategoryStore::const_iterator i_scstore = sSpellsByCategoryStore.find(categoryId);
2883 if (categorycooldown && i_scstore != sSpellsByCategoryStore.end())
2884 {
2885 for (SpellCategorySet::const_iterator i_scset = i_scstore->second.begin(); i_scset != i_scstore->second.end(); ++i_scset)
2886 {
2887 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(i_scset->second, categoryId, categorycooldown);
2888 }
2889 }
2890 else if (spellcooldown)
2891 {
2892 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, spellcooldown);
2893 }
2894
2895 if (sSpellMgr->HasSpellCooldownOverride(spellInfo->Id))
2896 {
2897 if (IsCharmed() && GetCharmer()->IsPlayer())
2898 {
2899 WorldPacket data;
2900 BuildCooldownPacket(data, SPELL_COOLDOWN_FLAG_NONE, spellInfo->Id, spellcooldown);
2901 GetCharmer()->ToPlayer()->SendDirectMessage(&data);
2902 }
2903 }
2904}
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32

◆ AddToWorld()

void Creature::AddToWorld ( )
overridevirtual
  • Register the creature for guid lookup

Reimplemented from Object.

Reimplemented in Pet.

311{
313 if (!IsInWorld())
314 {
315 // pussywizard: motion master needs to be initialized before OnCreatureCreate, which may set death state to JUST_DIED, to prevent crash
316 // it's also initialized in AIM_Initialize(), few lines below, but it's not a problem
317 Motion_Initialize();
318
319 GetMap()->GetObjectsStore().Insert<Creature>(GetGUID(), this);
320 if (m_spawnId)
321 {
322 GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().insert(std::make_pair(m_spawnId, this));
323 }
324 Unit::AddToWorld();
325
326 SearchFormation();
327
328 AIM_Initialize();
329
330 if (IsVehicle())
331 {
332 GetVehicleKit()->Install();
333 }
334
335 if (GetZoneScript())
336 {
337 GetZoneScript()->OnCreatureCreate(this);
338 }
339
340 loot.sourceWorldObjectGUID = GetGUID();
341
342 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureAddWorld(this);
343 }
344}

◆ AIM_Initialize()

bool Creature::AIM_Initialize ( CreatureAI *  ai = nullptr)
1087{
1088 // make sure nothing can change the AI during AI update
1089 if (m_AI_locked)
1090 {
1091 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "AIM_Initialize: failed to init, locked.");
1092 return false;
1093 }
1094
1095 UnitAI* oldAI = i_AI;
1096
1097 // Xinef: called in add to world
1098 //Motion_Initialize();
1099
1100 i_AI = ai ? ai : FactorySelector::SelectAI(this);
1101 delete oldAI;
1102 IsAIEnabled = true;
1103 i_AI->InitializeAI();
1104
1105 // Xinef: Initialize vehicle if it is not summoned!
1106 if (GetVehicleKit() && m_spawnId)
1107 GetVehicleKit()->Reset();
1108 return true;
1109}

◆ AllLootRemovedFromCorpse()

void Creature::AllLootRemovedFromCorpse ( )
2989{
2990 if (loot.loot_type != LOOT_SKINNING && !IsPet() && GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId && hasLootRecipient())
2991 {
2992 if (LootTemplates_Skinning.HaveLootFor(GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId))
2993 {
2994 SetUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE);
2995 }
2996 }
2997
2998 time_t now = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2999 if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= now)
3000 {
3001 return;
3002 }
3003
3004 float decayRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CORPSE_DECAY_LOOTED);
3005 uint32 diff = uint32((m_corpseRemoveTime - now) * decayRate);
3006
3007 m_respawnTime -= diff;
3008
3009 // corpse skinnable, but without skinning flag, and then skinned, corpse will despawn next update
3010 if (loot.loot_type == LOOT_SKINNING)
3011 {
3012 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
3013 }
3014 else
3015 {
3016 m_corpseRemoveTime -= diff;
3017 }
3018}

◆ CalculateMinMaxDamage()

void Creature::CalculateMinMaxDamage ( WeaponAttackType  attType,
bool  normalized,
bool  addTotalPct,
float &  minDamage,
float &  maxDamage,
uint8  damageIndex 
)
overridevirtual

Implements Unit.

1093{
1094 // creatures only have one damage
1095 if (damageIndex != 0)
1096 {
1097 minDamage = 0.f;
1098 maxDamage = 0.f;
1099 return;
1100 }
1101
1102 UnitMods unitMod;
1103 float variance = 1.0f;
1104 switch (attType)
1105 {
1106 case BASE_ATTACK:
1107 default:
1108 variance = GetCreatureTemplate()->BaseVariance;
1109 unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND;
1110 break;
1111 case OFF_ATTACK:
1112 variance = GetCreatureTemplate()->BaseVariance;
1113 unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND;
1114 break;
1115 case RANGED_ATTACK:
1116 variance = GetCreatureTemplate()->RangeVariance;
1117 unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED;
1118 break;
1119 }
1120
1121 if (attType == OFF_ATTACK && !HasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
1122 {
1123 minDamage = 0.0f;
1124 maxDamage = 0.0f;
1125 return;
1126 }
1127
1128 float weaponMinDamage = GetWeaponDamageRange(attType, MINDAMAGE);
1129 float weaponMaxDamage = GetWeaponDamageRange(attType, MAXDAMAGE);
1130
1131 // Disarm for creatures
1132 if (HasWeapon(attType) && !HasWeaponForAttack(attType))
1133 {
1134 minDamage *= 0.5f;
1135 maxDamage *= 0.5f;
1136 }
1137
1138 float attackPower = GetTotalAttackPowerValue(attType);
1139 float attackSpeedMulti = GetAPMultiplier(attType, normalized);
1140 float baseValue = GetModifierValue(unitMod, BASE_VALUE) + (attackPower / 14.0f) * variance;
1141 float basePct = GetModifierValue(unitMod, BASE_PCT) * attackSpeedMulti;
1142 float totalValue = GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_VALUE);
1143 float totalPct = addTotalPct ? GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT) : 1.0f;
1144 float dmgMultiplier = GetCreatureTemplate()->DamageModifier; // = DamageModifier * _GetDamageMod(rank);
1145
1146 minDamage = ((weaponMinDamage + baseValue) * dmgMultiplier * basePct + totalValue) * totalPct;
1147 maxDamage = ((weaponMaxDamage + baseValue) * dmgMultiplier * basePct + totalValue) * totalPct;
1148
1149 // pussywizard: crashfix (casting negative to uint => min > max => assertion in urand)
1150 if (minDamage < 0.0f || minDamage > 1000000000.0f)
1151 minDamage = 0.0f;
1152 if (maxDamage < 0.0f || maxDamage > 1000000000.0f)
1153 maxDamage = 0.0f;
1154 if (minDamage > maxDamage)
1155 minDamage = maxDamage;
1156}
MINDAMAGE
@ MINDAMAGE
Definition: Unit.h:135
MAXDAMAGE
@ MAXDAMAGE
Definition: Unit.h:136
UnitMods
UnitMods

◆ CallAssistance()

void Creature::CallAssistance ( Unit *  target = nullptr)
2434{
2435 if (!target)
2436 {
2437 target = GetVictim();
2438 }
2439
2440 if (!m_AlreadyCallAssistance && target && !IsPet() && !IsCharmed())
2441 {
2442 SetNoCallAssistance(true);
2443
2444 float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
2445
2446 if (radius > 0)
2447 {
2448 std::list<Creature*> assistList;
2449
2450 Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck u_check(this, target, radius);
2451 Acore::CreatureListSearcher<Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck> searcher(this, assistList, u_check);
2452 Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
2453
2454 if (!assistList.empty())
2455 {
2456 AssistDelayEvent* e = new AssistDelayEvent(target->GetGUID(), this);
2457 while (!assistList.empty())
2458 {
2459 // Pushing guids because in delay can happen some creature gets despawned => invalid pointer
2460 e->AddAssistant((*assistList.begin())->GetGUID());
2461 assistList.pop_front();
2462 }
2463 m_Events.AddEvent(e, m_Events.CalculateTime(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_DELAY)));
2464 }
2465 }
2466 }
2467}

◆ CanAssistTo()

bool Creature::CanAssistTo ( Unit const *  u,
Unit const *  enemy,
bool  checkfaction = true 
) const
Todo:
: Implement aggro range, detection range and assistance range templates
2492{
2493 // is it true?
2494 if (!HasReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE))
2495 return false;
2496
2497 // we don't need help from zombies :)
2498 if (!IsAlive())
2499 return false;
2500
2501 // Xinef: we cannot assist in evade mode
2502 if (IsInEvadeMode())
2503 return false;
2504
2505 // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2506 if (enemy && enemy->IsCreature() && enemy->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2507 return false;
2508
2509 // we don't need help from non-combatant ;)
2510 if (IsCivilian())
2511 return false;
2512
2513 if (HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE) || IsImmuneToNPC())
2514 return false;
2515
2516 // skip fighting creature
2517 if (IsEngaged())
2518 return false;
2519
2520 // only free creature
2521 if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
2522 return false;
2523
2525 if (m_creatureInfo->HasFlagsExtra(CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_ALL_ASSISTANCE_CALLS))
2526 {
2527 return false;
2528 }
2529
2530 // only from same creature faction
2531 if (checkfaction)
2532 {
2533 if (GetFaction() != u->GetFaction())
2534 return false;
2535 }
2536 else
2537 {
2538 if (!IsFriendlyTo(u))
2539 return false;
2540 }
2541
2542 // skip non hostile to caster enemy creatures
2543 if (!IsHostileTo(enemy))
2544 return false;
2545
2546 // Check if can see the enemy
2547 if (!CanSeeOrDetect(enemy))
2548 {
2549 return false;
2550 }
2551
2552 return true;
2553}

3829{
3830 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spellID);

◆ CanCreatureAttack()

bool Creature::CanCreatureAttack ( Unit const *  victim,
bool  skipDistCheck = false 
) const
2626{
2627 if (!victim->IsInMap(this))
2628 return false;
2629
2630 if (!IsValidAttackTarget(victim))
2631 return false;
2632
2633 if (!victim->isInAccessiblePlaceFor(this))
2634 return false;
2635
2636 if (IsAIEnabled && !AI()->CanAIAttack(victim))
2637 return false;
2638
2639 // pussywizard: we cannot attack in evade mode
2640 if (IsInEvadeMode())
2641 return false;
2642
2643 // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2644 if (victim->IsCreature() && victim->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2645 return false;
2646
2647 // cannot attack if is during 5 second grace period, unless being attacked
2648 if (m_respawnedTime && (GameTime::GetGameTime().count() - m_respawnedTime) < 5 && !IsEngagedBy(victim))
2649 {
2650 return false;
2651 }
2652
2653 // if victim is in FD and we can't see that
2654 if (victim->HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH) && !CanIgnoreFeignDeath())
2655 {
2656 return false;
2657 }
2658
2659 if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
2660 {
2661 if (GetMap()->IsDungeon())
2662 return true;
2663
2664 float visibility = std::max<float>(GetVisibilityRange(), victim->GetVisibilityRange());
2665
2666 // if outside visibility
2667 if (!IsWithinDist(victim, visibility))
2668 return false;
2669
2670 // pussywizard: don't check distance to home position if recently damaged (allow kiting away from spawnpoint!)
2671 // xinef: this should include taunt auras
2672 if (!isWorldBoss() && (GetLastLeashExtensionTime() + 12 > GameTime::GetGameTime().count() || HasTauntAura()))
2673 return true;
2674 }
2675
2676 if (skipDistCheck)
2677 return true;
2678
2679 // xinef: added size factor for huge npcs
2680 float dist = std::min<float>(GetDetectionRange() + GetObjectSize() * 2, 150.0f);
2681
2682 if (Unit* unit = GetCharmerOrOwner())
2683 {
2684 dist = std::min<float>(GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + GetObjectSize() * 2, 150.0f);
2685 return victim->IsWithinDist(unit, dist);
2686 }
2687 else
2688 {
2689 // to prevent creatures in air ignore attacks because distance is already too high...
2690 if (GetMovementTemplate().IsFlightAllowed())
2691 return victim->IsInDist2d(&m_homePosition, dist);
2692 else
2693 return victim->IsInDist(&m_homePosition, dist);
2694 }
2695}

◆ CanStartAttack()

bool Creature::CanStartAttack ( Unit const *  u) const
1909{
1910 if (IsCivilian())
1911 return false;
1912
1913 // This set of checks is should be done only for creatures
1914 if ((IsImmuneToNPC() && !who->IsPlayer()) || // flag is valid only for non player characters
1915 (IsImmuneToPC() && who->IsPlayer())) // immune to PC and target is a player, return false
1916 {
1917 return false;
1918 }
1919
1920 if (Unit* owner = who->GetOwner())
1921 if (owner->IsPlayer() && IsImmuneToPC()) // immune to PC and target has player owner
1922 return false;
1923
1924 // Do not attack non-combat pets
1925 if (who->IsCreature() && who->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET)
1926 return false;
1927
1928 if (!CanFly() && (GetDistanceZ(who) > CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE + m_CombatDistance)) // too much Z difference, skip very costy vmap calculations here
1929 return false;
1930
1931 if (!_IsTargetAcceptable(who))
1932 return false;
1933
1934 // pussywizard: at this point we are either hostile to who or friendly to who->getAttackerForHelper()
1935 // pussywizard: if who is in combat and has an attacker, help him if the distance is right (help because who is hostile or help because attacker is friendly)
1936 bool assist = false;
1937 if (who->IsEngaged() && IsWithinDist(who, ATTACK_DISTANCE))
1938 if (Unit* victim = who->getAttackerForHelper())
1939 if (IsWithinDistInMap(victim, sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS)))
1940 assist = true;
1941
1942 if (!assist)
1943 if (IsNeutralToAll() || !IsWithinDistInMap(who, GetAggroRange(who) + m_CombatDistance, true, false)) // pussywizard: +m_combatDistance for turrets and similar
1944 return false;
1945
1946 if (!CanCreatureAttack(who))
1947 return false;
1948
1949 if (HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED))
1950 return false;
1951
1952 return IsWithinLOSInMap(who);
1953}
CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET
@ CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET
Definition: SharedDefines.h:2639
ATTACK_DISTANCE
#define ATTACK_DISTANCE
Definition: ObjectDefines.h:25
UNIT_STATE_STUNNED
@ UNIT_STATE_STUNNED
Definition: UnitDefines.h:152
CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE
#define CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE
Definition: Creature.h:38
Creature::_IsTargetAcceptable
bool _IsTargetAcceptable(Unit const *target) const
Definition: Creature.cpp:2557

◆ CanSwim()

bool Creature::CanSwim ( ) const
overridevirtual

This method check the current flag/status of a creature and its inhabit type.

Pets should swim by default to properly follow the player NOTE: You can set the UNIT_FLAG_CANNOT_SWIM temporary to deny a creature to swim

Reimplemented from Unit.

3268 return false;

)

Relocate before CreateFromProto, to initialize coords and allow returning correct zone id for selecting OutdoorPvP/Battlefield script

Need to be called after LoadCreaturesAddon - MOVEMENTFLAG_HOVER is set there

1127{
1128 ASSERT(map);
1129 SetMap(map);
1130 SetPhaseMask(phaseMask, false);
1131
1132 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
1133 if (!cinfo)
1134 {
1135 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::Create(): creature template (guidlow: {}, entry: {}) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
1136 return false;
1137 }
1138
1141 Relocate(x, y, z, ang);
1142
1143 if (!IsPositionValid())
1144 {
1145 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::Create(): given coordinates for creature (guidlow {}, entry {}) are not valid (X: {}, Y: {}, Z: {}, O: {})", guidlow, Entry, x, y, z, ang);
1146 return false;
1147 }
1148

1156 return false;
1157

1159
1160 switch (GetCreatureTemplate()->rank)
1161 {
1162 case CREATURE_ELITE_RARE:
1163 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RARE);
1164 break;
1165 case CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE:
1166 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE);
1167 break;
1168 case CREATURE_ELITE_RAREELITE:
1169 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RAREELITE);
1170 break;
1171 case CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS:
1172 // Xinef: Reduce corpse delay for bossess outside of instance
1173 if (!GetInstanceId())
1174 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE) * 2;
1175 else
1176 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_WORLDBOSS);
1177 break;
1178 default:
1179 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_NORMAL);
1180 break;
1181 }
1182
1183 CreatureModel display(GetNativeDisplayId(), GetNativeObjectScale(), 1.0f);
1184 CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&display, cinfo);
1185 if (minfo && !IsTotem()) // Cancel load if no model defined or if totem
1186 {
1187 SetDisplayId(display.CreatureDisplayID, display.DisplayScale);
1188 SetNativeDisplayId(display.CreatureDisplayID);
1189 }
1190
1191 LoadCreaturesAddon();
1192
1194 m_positionZ += GetHoverHeight();
1195
1196 LastUsedScriptID = GetScriptId();
1197

1199 {
1200 m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1201 m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1202 }
1203 else if (cinfo->type_flags & CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_VISIBLE_TO_GHOSTS) // Xinef: Add ghost visibility for ghost units
1204 {
1205 m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE | GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1206 m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE | GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1207 }
1208 if (Entry == VISUAL_WAYPOINT)
1209 SetVisible(false);
1210
1211 if (GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_PATHFINDING)
1212 AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING);
1213
1214 return true;
1215}

◆ CreateFromProto()

bool Creature::CreateFromProto ( ObjectGuid::LowType  guidlow,
uint32  Entry,
uint32  vehId,
const CreatureData *  data = nullptr 
)
protected
1631{
1632 SetZoneScript();
1633 if (GetZoneScript() && data)
1634 {
1635 uint32 FirstEntry = GetZoneScript()->GetCreatureEntry(guidlow, data);
1636 if (!FirstEntry)
1637 return false;
1638 }
1639
1640 CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
1641 if (!normalInfo)
1642 {
1643 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::CreateFromProto(): creature template (guidlow: {}, entry: {}) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
1644 return false;
1645 }
1646
1647 SetOriginalEntry(Entry);
1648
1649 Object::_Create(guidlow, Entry, (vehId || normalInfo->VehicleId) ? HighGuid::Vehicle : HighGuid::Unit);
1650
1651 // Xinef: select proper vehicle id
1652 if (!vehId)
1653 {
1654 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
1655 for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
1656 {
1657 // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
1658 if (cinfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
1659 {
1660 cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
1661 if (cinfo && cinfo->VehicleId)
1662 break; // template found
1663
1664 // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
1665 cinfo = normalInfo;
1666 }
1667
1668 // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
1669 if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
1670 diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
1671 else
1672 --diff;
1673 }
1674
1675 if (cinfo->VehicleId)
1676 CreateVehicleKit(cinfo->VehicleId, (cinfo->VehicleId != normalInfo->VehicleId ? cinfo->Entry : normalInfo->Entry));
1677 }
1678 else
1679 CreateVehicleKit(vehId, Entry);
1680
1681 if (!UpdateEntry(Entry, data))
1682 return false;
1683
1684 return true;
1685}

◆ DespawnOnEvade()

void Creature::DespawnOnEvade ( Seconds  respawnDelay = 20s)
2187{
2188 AI()->SummonedCreatureDespawnAll();
2189
2190 if (respawnDelay < 2s)
2191 {
2192 LOG_WARN("entities.unit", "DespawnOnEvade called with delay of {} seconds, defaulting to 2.", respawnDelay.count());
2193 respawnDelay = 2s;
2194 }
2195

2197 {
2198 LOG_WARN("entities.unit", "DespawnOnEvade called on a temporary summon.");
2199 whoSummon->UnSummon();
2200 return;
2201 }
2202

2204}

◆ DoFleeToGetAssistance()

void Creature::DoFleeToGetAssistance ( )
1057{
1058 if (!GetVictim())
1059 return;
1060
1061 if (HasPreventsFleeingAura())
1062 return;
1063
1064 float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
1065 if (radius > 0)
1066 {
1067 Creature* creature = nullptr;
1068
1069 Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck u_check(this, GetVictim(), radius);
1070 Acore::CreatureLastSearcher<Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck> searcher(this, creature, u_check);
1071
1072 Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
1073
1074 SetNoSearchAssistance(true);
1075 UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, false);
1076
1077 if (!creature)
1078 //SetFeared(true, GetVictim()->GetGUID(), 0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_DELAY));
1079 //TODO: use 31365
1080 SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING, GetVictim());
1081 else
1082 GetMotionMaster()->MoveSeekAssistance(creature->GetPositionX(), creature->GetPositionY(), creature->GetPositionZ());
1083 }
1084}
CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS
@ CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS
Definition: IWorld.h:198
UNIT_STATE_FLEEING
@ UNIT_STATE_FLEEING

◆ FocusTarget()

void Creature::FocusTarget ( Spell const *  focusSpell,
WorldObject const *  target 
)
3552{
3553 // already focused
3554 if (_focusSpell)
3555 return;
3556
3557 _focusSpell = focusSpell;
3558
3559 SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_TARGET, this == target ? ObjectGuid::Empty : target->GetGUID());
3560 if (focusSpell->GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_AI_DOESNT_FACE_TARGET))
3561 AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROTATING);
3562
3563 // Set serverside orientation if needed (needs to be after attribute check)
3564 if (this == target && (movespline->Finalized() || GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == CHASE_MOTION_TYPE))
3565 SetFacingTo(GetOrientation());
3566 else
3567 SetInFront(target);
3568}

◆ GetAggroRange()

float Creature::GetAggroRange ( Unit const *  target) const
3392{
3393 // Determines the aggro range for creatures
3394 // Based on data from wowwiki due to lack of 3.3.5a data
3395
3396 float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3397 if (aggroRate == 0)
3398 return 0.0f;
3399
3400 auto creatureLevel = target->getLevelForTarget(this);
3401 auto playerLevel = getLevelForTarget(target);
3402 int32 levelDiff = int32(creatureLevel) - int32(playerLevel);
3403
3404 // The maximum Aggro Radius is capped at 45 yards (25 level difference)
3405 if (levelDiff < -25)
3406 levelDiff = -25;
3407
3408 // The base aggro radius for mob of same level
3409 auto aggroRadius = GetDetectionRange();
3410 if (aggroRadius < 1)
3411 {
3412 return 0.0f;
3413 }
3414 // Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level
3415 aggroRadius -= (float)levelDiff;
3416
3417 // detect range auras
3418 aggroRadius += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE);
3419
3420 // detected range auras
3421 aggroRadius += target->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE);
3422
3423 // Just in case, we don't want pets running all over the map
3424 if (aggroRadius > MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS)
3425 aggroRadius = MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS;
3426
3427 // Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)
3428 // hunter pets seem to ignore minimum aggro radius so we'll default it a little higher
3429 float minRange = IsPet() ? 10.0f : 5.0f;
3430 if (aggroRadius < minRange)
3431 aggroRadius = minRange;
3432
3433 return (aggroRadius * aggroRate);
3434}
SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE
@ SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE
Definition: SpellAuraDefines.h:215
SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE
@ SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE
Definition: SpellAuraDefines.h:154
RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO
@ RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO
Definition: IWorld.h:500
MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS
#define MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS
Definition: Unit.h:43
Creature::getLevelForTarget
uint8 getLevelForTarget(WorldObject const *target) const override
Definition: Creature.cpp:3020
Unit::GetTotalAuraModifier
int32 GetTotalAuraModifier(AuraType auratype) const
Definition: Unit.cpp:5910

References GetDetectionRange(), Unit::getLevelForTarget(), getLevelForTarget(), Unit::GetTotalAuraModifier(), Unit::IsPet(), MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS, RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO, SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE, and sWorld.

Referenced by CanStartAttack(), and npc_amanishi_tempest::UpdateAI().

◆ GetAttackDistance()

float Creature::GetAttackDistance ( Unit const *  player) const
3597{
3598 float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3599
3600 if (aggroRate == 0)
3601 return 0.0f;
3602
3603 if (!player)
3604 return 0.0f;
3605
3606 uint32 playerLevel = player->getLevelForTarget(this);
3607 uint32 creatureLevel = getLevelForTarget(player);
3608
3609 int32 levelDiff = static_cast<int32>(playerLevel) - static_cast<int32>(creatureLevel);
3610
3611 // "The maximum Aggro Radius has a cap of 25 levels under. Example: A level 30 char has the same Aggro Radius of a level 5 char on a level 60 mob."
3612 if (levelDiff < -25)
3613 levelDiff = -25;
3614
3615 // "The aggro radius of a mob having the same level as the player is roughly 20 yards"
3616 float retDistance = 20.0f;
3617
3618 // "Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level"
3619 // radius grow if playlevel < creaturelevel
3620 retDistance -= static_cast<float>(levelDiff);
3621
3622 if (creatureLevel + 5 <= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3623 {
3624 // detect range auras
3625 retDistance += static_cast<float>( GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE));
3626
3627 // detected range auras
3628 retDistance += static_cast<float>( player->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE));
3629 }
3630
3631 // "Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)"
3632 if (retDistance < 5.0f)
3633 retDistance = 5.0f;
3634
3635 return (retDistance * aggroRate);
3636}
CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL
@ CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL
Definition: IWorld.h:236

References CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL, Unit::getLevelForTarget(), getLevelForTarget(), Unit::GetTotalAuraModifier(), RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO, SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE, and sWorld.

Referenced by WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf().

◆ GetVendorItemCurrentCount()

uint32 Creature::GetVendorItemCurrentCount ( VendorItem const *  vItem)
3061{
3062 if (!vItem->maxcount)
3063 return vItem->maxcount;
3064
3065 VendorItemCounts::iterator itr = m_vendorItemCounts.begin();
3066 for (; itr != m_vendorItemCounts.end(); ++itr)
3067 if (itr->itemId == vItem->item)
3068 break;
3069
3070 if (itr == m_vendorItemCounts.end())
3071 return vItem->maxcount;
3072
3073 VendorItemCount* vCount = &*itr;
3074
3075 time_t ptime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
3076
3077 if (time_t(vCount->lastIncrementTime + vItem->incrtime) <= ptime)
3078 {
3079 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(vItem->item);
3080
3081 uint32 diff = uint32((ptime - vCount->lastIncrementTime) / vItem->incrtime);
3082 if ((vCount->count + diff * pProto->BuyCount) >= vItem->maxcount)
3083 {
3084 m_vendorItemCounts.erase(itr);
3085 return vItem->maxcount;
3086 }
3087
3088 vCount->count += diff * pProto->BuyCount;
3089 vCount->lastIncrementTime = ptime;
3090 }
3091
3092 return vCount->count;
3093}
VendorItemCount
Definition: CreatureData.h:496
VendorItemCount::lastIncrementTime
time_t lastIncrementTime
Definition: CreatureData.h:501
VendorItemCount::count
uint32 count

◆ InitEntry()

bool Creature::InitEntry ( uint32  Entry,
const CreatureData *  data = nullptr 
)
protected

change the entry of creature until respawn

439{
440 CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
441 if (!normalInfo)
442 {
443 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::InitEntry creature entry {} does not exist.", Entry);
444 return false;
445 }
446
447 // get difficulty 1 mode entry
448 // Xinef: Skip for pets!
449 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
450 for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
451 {
452 // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
453 if (normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
454 {
455 cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
456 if (cinfo)
457 break; // template found
458
459 // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
460 cinfo = normalInfo;
461 }
462
463 // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
464 if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
465 diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
466 else
467 --diff;
468 }
469
470 SetEntry(Entry); // normal entry always
471 m_creatureInfo = cinfo; // map mode related always
472
473 // equal to player Race field, but creature does not have race
474 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 0, 0);
475
476 // known valid are: CLASS_WARRIOR, CLASS_PALADIN, CLASS_ROGUE, CLASS_MAGE
477 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 1, uint8(cinfo->unit_class));
478
479 // Cancel load if no model defined
480 if (!(cinfo->GetFirstValidModel()))
481 {
482 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: {}) has no model defined in table `creature_template_model`, can't load. ", Entry);
483 return false;
484 }
485
486 CreatureModel model = *ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(cinfo, data);
487 CreatureModelInfo const* mInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&model, cinfo);
488 if (!mInfo) // Cancel load if no model defined
489 {
490 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: {}) has no model {} defined in table `creature_template_model`, can't load. ", Entry, model.CreatureDisplayID);
491 return false;
492 }
493
494 SetDisplayId(model.CreatureDisplayID, model.DisplayScale);
495 SetNativeDisplayId(model.CreatureDisplayID);
496
497 // Load creature equipment
498 if (!data)
499 {
500 LoadEquipment(); // use default from the template
501 }
502 else if (data->equipmentId == 0)
503 {
504 LoadEquipment(0); // 0 means no equipment for creature table
505 }
506 else
507 {
508 m_originalEquipmentId = data->equipmentId;
509 LoadEquipment(data->equipmentId);
510 }
511
512 SetName(normalInfo->Name); // at normal entry always
513
514 SetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED, 1.0f);
515
516 SetSpeed(MOVE_WALK, cinfo->speed_walk);
517 SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, cinfo->speed_run);
518 SetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, cinfo->speed_swim);
519 SetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, cinfo->speed_flight);
520
521 // Will set UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS and UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH
522 SetObjectScale(GetNativeObjectScale());
523
524 SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT, cinfo->HoverHeight);
525
526 SetCanDualWield(cinfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_USE_OFFHAND_ATTACK);
527
528 // checked at loading
529 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(cinfo->MovementType);
530 if (!m_wanderDistance && m_defaultMovementType == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE)
531 m_defaultMovementType = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
532
533 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
534 m_spells[i] = GetCreatureTemplate()->spells[i];
535
536 return true;
537}
UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0
@ UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0
Definition: UpdateFields.h:95

@ UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED

◆ isCanInteractWithBattleMaster()

bool Creature::isCanInteractWithBattleMaster ( Player *  player,
bool  msg 
) const
1218{
1219 if (!IsBattleMaster())
1220 return false;
1221
1222 BattlegroundTypeId bgTypeId = sBattlegroundMgr->GetBattleMasterBG(GetEntry());
1223 if (!msg)
1224 return player->GetBGAccessByLevel(bgTypeId);
1225
1226 if (!player->GetBGAccessByLevel(bgTypeId))
1227 {
1228 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
1229 switch (bgTypeId)
1230 {
1231 case BATTLEGROUND_AV:
1232 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7616, this);
1233 break;
1234 case BATTLEGROUND_WS:
1235 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7599, this);
1236 break;
1237 case BATTLEGROUND_AB:
1238 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7642, this);
1239 break;
1240 case BATTLEGROUND_EY:
1241 case BATTLEGROUND_NA:
1242 case BATTLEGROUND_BE:
1243 case BATTLEGROUND_AA:
1244 case BATTLEGROUND_RL:
1245 case BATTLEGROUND_SA:
1246 case BATTLEGROUND_DS:
1247 case BATTLEGROUND_RV:
1248 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 10024, this);
1249 break;
1250 default:
1251 break;
1252 }
1253 return false;
1254 }
1255 return true;
1256}

2250{

2252 return false;
2253

2255 {
2256 return false;
2257 }
2258
2259 // Xinef: this should exclude self casts...
2260 // Spells that don't have effectMechanics.

2262 return true;
2263
2264 // This check must be done instead of 'if (GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask & (1 << (spellInfo->Mechanic - 1)))' for not break
2265 // the check of mechanic immunity on DB (tested) because GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask and m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC] don't have same data.
2266 bool immunedToAllEffects = true;
2267 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2268 if (spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect() && !IsImmunedToSpellEffect(spellInfo, i))
2269 {
2270 immunedToAllEffects = false;
2271 break;
2272 }
2273 if (immunedToAllEffects)
2274 return true;
2275
2276 return Unit::IsImmunedToSpell(spellInfo, spell);

◆ IsValidTrainerForPlayer()

bool Creature::IsValidTrainerForPlayer ( Player *  player,
uint32 *  npcFlags = nullptr 
) const
1266{
1267 if (!IsTrainer())
1268 {
1269 return false;
1270 }
1271
1272 switch (m_creatureInfo->trainer_type)
1273 {
1274 case TRAINER_TYPE_CLASS:
1275 case TRAINER_TYPE_PETS:
1276 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_class && !player->IsClass((Classes)m_creatureInfo->trainer_class, CLASS_CONTEXT_CLASS_TRAINER))
1277 {
1278 if (npcFlags)
1279 *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_CLASS;
1280
1281 return false;
1282 }
1283 break;
1284 case TRAINER_TYPE_MOUNTS:
1285 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_race && m_creatureInfo->trainer_race != player->getRace())
1286 {
1287 return false;
1288 }
1289 break;
1290 case TRAINER_TYPE_TRADESKILLS:
1291 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell && !player->HasSpell(m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell))
1292 {
1293 if (npcFlags)
1294 *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_PROFESSION;
1295
1296 return false;
1297 }
1298 break;
1299 default:
1300 break;
1301 }
1302
1303 return true;
1304}

◆ LoadCreatureFromDB()

bool Creature::LoadCreatureFromDB ( ObjectGuid::LowType  guid,
Map *  map,
bool  addToMap = true,
bool  allowDuplicate = false 
)
1693{
1694 if (!allowDuplicate)
1695 {
1696 // If an alive instance of this spawnId is already found, skip creation
1697 // If only dead instance(s) exist, despawn them and spawn a new (maybe also dead) version
1698 const auto creatureBounds = map->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().equal_range(spawnId);
1699 std::vector <Creature*> despawnList;
1700
1701 if (creatureBounds.first != creatureBounds.second)
1702 {
1703 for (auto itr = creatureBounds.first; itr != creatureBounds.second; ++itr)
1704 {
1705 if (itr->second->IsAlive())
1706 {
1707 LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Would have spawned {} but {} already exists", spawnId, creatureBounds.first->second->GetGUID().ToString());
1708 return false;
1709 }
1710 else
1711 {
1712 despawnList.push_back(itr->second);
1713 LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Despawned dead instance of spawn {} ({})", spawnId, itr->second->GetGUID().ToString());
1714 }
1715 }
1716
1717 for (Creature* despawnCreature : despawnList)
1718 {
1719 despawnCreature->AddObjectToRemoveList();
1720 }
1721 }
1722 }
1723
1724 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(spawnId);
1725 if (!data)
1726 {
1727 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (SpawnId: {}) not found in table `creature`, can't load. ", spawnId);
1728 return false;
1729 }
1730
1731 // xinef: this has to be assigned before Create function, properly loads equipment id from DB
1732 m_creatureData = data;
1733 m_spawnId = spawnId;
1734
1735 // Add to world
1736 uint32 entry = GetRandomId(data->id1, data->id2, data->id3);
1737
1738 if (!Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::Unit>(), map, data->phaseMask, entry, 0, data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation, data))
1739 return false;
1740
1741 //We should set first home position, because then AI calls home movement
1742 SetHomePosition(data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation);
1743
1744 m_wanderDistance = data->wander_distance;
1745
1746 m_respawnDelay = data->spawntimesecs;
1747 m_deathState = DeathState::Alive;
1748
1749 m_respawnTime = GetMap()->GetCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
1750 if (m_respawnTime) // respawn on Update
1751 {
1752 m_deathState = DeathState::Dead;
1753 if (CanFly())
1754 {
1755 float tz = map->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, true, MAX_FALL_DISTANCE);
1756 if (data->posZ - tz > 0.1f && Acore::IsValidMapCoord(tz))
1757 {
1758 Relocate(data->posX, data->posY, tz);
1759 }
1760 }
1761 }
1762
1763 uint32 curhealth;
1764
1765 if (!m_regenHealth)
1766 {
1767 curhealth = data->curhealth;
1768 if (curhealth)
1769 {
1770 curhealth = uint32(curhealth * _GetHealthMod(GetCreatureTemplate()->rank));
1771 if (curhealth < 1)
1772 curhealth = 1;
1773 }
1774 SetPower(POWER_MANA, data->curmana);
1775 }
1776 else
1777 {
1778 curhealth = GetMaxHealth();
1779 SetPower(POWER_MANA, GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
1780 }
1781
1782 SetHealth(m_deathState == DeathState::Alive ? curhealth : 0);
1783
1784 // checked at creature_template loading
1785 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(data->movementType);
1786
1787 if (addToMap && !GetMap()->AddToMap(this))
1788 return false;
1789 return true;
1790}

◆ LoadCreaturesAddon()

bool Creature::LoadCreaturesAddon ( bool  reload = false)

Suspected correlation between UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, offset 3, value 0x2: If no inhabittype_fly (if no MovementFlag_DisableGravity or MovementFlag_CanFly flag found in sniffs) Check using InhabitType as movement flags are assigned dynamically basing on whether the creature is in air or not Set MovementFlag_Hover. Otherwise do nothing.

2711{
2712 CreatureAddon const* cainfo = GetCreatureAddon();
2713 if (!cainfo)
2714 return false;
2715
2716 if (cainfo->mount != 0)
2717 Mount(cainfo->mount);
2718
2719 if (cainfo->bytes1 != 0)
2720 {
2721 // 0 StandState
2722 // 1 FreeTalentPoints Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2723 // 2 StandFlags
2724 // 3 StandMiscFlags
2725
2726 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE, uint8(cainfo->bytes1 & 0xFF));
2727 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2728 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, 0);
2729 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAG, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2730 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 24) & 0xFF));
2731
2737 if (CanHover())
2738 AddUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_HOVER);
2739 }
2740
2741 if (cainfo->bytes2 != 0)
2742 {
2743 // 0 SheathState
2744 // 1 Bytes2Flags
2745 // 2 UnitRename Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2746 // 3 ShapeshiftForm Must be determined/set by shapeshift spell/aura
2747
2748 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 0, uint8(cainfo->bytes2 & 0xFF));
2749 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2750 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2751 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, 0);
2752 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 24) & 0xFF));
2753 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, 0);
2754 }
2755
2756 SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, cainfo->emote);
2757
2758 // Check if visibility distance different
2759 if (cainfo->visibilityDistanceType != VisibilityDistanceType::Normal)
2760 {
2761 SetVisibilityDistanceOverride(cainfo->visibilityDistanceType);
2762 }
2763
2764 //Load Path
2765 if (cainfo->path_id != 0)
2766 {
2767 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SET_ALL_CREATURES_WITH_WAYPOINT_MOVEMENT_ACTIVE))
2768 setActive(true);
2769 m_path_id = cainfo->path_id;
2770 }
2771
2772 if (!cainfo->auras.empty())
2773 {
2774 for (std::vector<uint32>::const_iterator itr = cainfo->auras.begin(); itr != cainfo->auras.end(); ++itr)
2775 {
2776 SpellInfo const* AdditionalSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(*itr);
2777 if (!AdditionalSpellInfo)
2778 {
2779 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature ({}) has wrong spell {} defined in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString(), *itr);
2780 continue;
2781 }
2782
2783 // skip already applied aura
2784 if (HasAura(*itr))
2785 {
2786 if (!reload)
2787 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature ({}) has duplicate aura (spell {}) in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString(), *itr);
2788
2789 continue;
2790 }
2791
2792 AddAura(*itr, this);
2793 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Spell: {} added to creature ({})", *itr, GetGUID().ToString());
2794 }
2795 }
2796
2797 return true;
2798}

◆ LoadSpellTemplateImmunity()

void Creature::LoadSpellTemplateImmunity ( )
2220{
2221 // uint32 max used for "spell id", the immunity system will not perform SpellInfo checks against invalid spells
2222 // used so we know which immunities were loaded from template
2223 static uint32 const placeholderSpellId = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max();
2224
2225 // unapply template immunities (in case we're updating entry)
2226 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2227 {
2228 ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, i, false);
2229 }
2230
2231 // don't inherit immunities for hunter pets
2232 if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() && IsHunterPet())
2233 {
2234 return;
2235 }
2236
2237 if (uint8 mask = GetCreatureTemplate()->SpellSchoolImmuneMask)
2238 {
2239 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2240 {
2241 if (mask & (1 << i))
2242 {
2243 ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, 1 << i, true);
2244 }
2245 }
2246 }
2247}

◆ reachWithSpellAttack()

SpellInfo const * Creature::reachWithSpellAttack ( Unit *  victim)
2292{
2293 if (!victim)
2294 return nullptr;
2295
2296 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2297 {
2298 if (!m_spells[i])
2299 continue;
2300 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spells[i]);
2301 if (!spellInfo)
2302 {
2303 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "WORLD: unknown spell id {}", m_spells[i]);
2304 continue;
2305 }
2306
2307 bool bcontinue = true;
2308 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; j++)
2309 {
2310 if ((spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE) ||
2311 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTAKILL) ||
2312 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENVIRONMENTAL_DAMAGE) ||
2313 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
2314 )
2315 {
2316 bcontinue = false;
2317 break;
2318 }
2319 }
2320 if (bcontinue)
2321 continue;
2322
2323 if (spellInfo->ManaCost > GetPower(POWER_MANA))
2324 continue;
2325 float range = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(false);
2326 float minrange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(false);
2327 float dist = GetDistance(victim);
2328 if (dist > range || dist < minrange)
2329 continue;
2330 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2331 continue;
2332 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
2333 continue;
2334 return spellInfo;
2335 }
2336 return nullptr;
2337}

◆ reachWithSpellCure()

SpellInfo const * Creature::reachWithSpellCure ( Unit *  victim)
2340{
2341 if (!victim)
2342 return nullptr;
2343
2344 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2345 {
2346 if (!m_spells[i])
2347 continue;
2348 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spells[i]);
2349 if (!spellInfo)
2350 {
2351 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "WORLD: unknown spell id {}", m_spells[i]);
2352 continue;
2353 }
2354
2355 bool bcontinue = true;
2356 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; j++)
2357 {
2358 if ((spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL))
2359 {
2360 bcontinue = false;
2361 break;
2362 }
2363 }
2364 if (bcontinue)
2365 continue;
2366
2367 if (spellInfo->ManaCost > GetPower(POWER_MANA))
2368 continue;
2369
2370 float range = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true);
2371 float minrange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(true);
2372 float dist = GetDistance(victim);
2373
2374 if (dist > range || dist < minrange)
2375 continue;
2376 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2377 continue;
2378 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
2379 continue;
2380 return spellInfo;
2381 }
2382 return nullptr;
2383}

References SpellInfo::Effects, WorldObject::GetDistance(), SpellInfo::GetMaxRange(), SpellInfo::GetMinRange(), Unit::GetPower(), Unit::HasUnitFlag(), LOG_ERROR, m_spells, SpellInfo::ManaCost, MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS, MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS, POWER_MANA, SpellInfo::PreventionType, SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL, SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY, SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE, sSpellMgr, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED, and UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED.

◆ RefreshSwimmingFlag()

void Creature::RefreshSwimmingFlag ( bool  recheck = false)
3280{
3281 if (!_isMissingSwimmingFlagOutOfCombat || recheck)
3282 _isMissingSwimmingFlagOutOfCombat = !HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SWIMMING);
3283
3284 // Check if the creature has UNIT_FLAG_SWIMMING and add it if it's missing
3285 // Creatures must be able to chase a target in water if they can enter water
3286 if (_isMissingSwimmingFlagOutOfCombat && CanEnterWater())
3287 SetUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SWIMMING);
3288}

◆ Regenerate()

void Creature::Regenerate ( Powers  power)
protected
950{
951 uint32 curValue = GetPower(power);
952 uint32 maxValue = GetMaxPower(power);
953
954 // Xinef: implement power regeneration flag
955 if (!HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER) && !GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
956 return;
957
958 if (!m_regenPower)
959 {
960 return;
961 }
962
963 if (curValue >= maxValue)
964 return;
965
966 float addvalue = 0.0f;
967
968 switch (power)
969 {
970 case POWER_FOCUS:
971 {
972 // For hunter pets.
973 addvalue = 24 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_FOCUS);
974 break;
975 }
976 case POWER_ENERGY:
977 {
978 // For deathknight's ghoul.
979 addvalue = 20;
980 break;
981 }
982 case POWER_MANA:
983 {
984 // Combat and any controlled creature
985 if (IsInCombat() || GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
986 {
987 if (GetEntry() == NPC_IMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_TEMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_PERM)
988 {
989 addvalue = uint32((GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT) / (IsUnderLastManaUseEffect() ? 8.0f : 5.0f) + 17.0f));
990 }
991 else if (!IsUnderLastManaUseEffect())
992 {
993 float ManaIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_MANA);
994 float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
995
996 addvalue = uint32((Spirit / 5.0f + 17.0f) * ManaIncreaseRate);
997 }
998 }
999 else
1000 addvalue = maxValue / 3;
1001 break;
1002 }
1003 default:
1004 return;
1005 }
1006
1007 // Apply modifiers (if any).
1008 AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN_PERCENT);
1009 for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
1010 if (Powers((*i)->GetMiscValue()) == power)
1011 AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
1012
1013 addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN, power) * (power == POWER_FOCUS ? PET_FOCUS_REGEN_INTERVAL.count() : CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL) / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1014
1015 ModifyPower(power, int32(addvalue));
1016}

◆ RegenerateHealth()

void Creature::RegenerateHealth ( )
protected
1019{
1020 if (!isRegeneratingHealth())
1021 return;
1022
1023 uint32 curValue = GetHealth();
1024 uint32 maxValue = GetMaxHealth();
1025
1026 if (curValue >= maxValue)
1027 return;
1028
1029 uint32 addvalue = 0;
1030
1031 // Not only pet, but any controlled creature
1032 // Xinef: fix polymorph rapid regen
1033 if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID() || IsPolymorphed())
1034 addvalue = maxValue / 3;
1035 else //if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
1036 {
1037 float HealthIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_HEALTH);
1038 float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
1039
1040 if (GetPower(POWER_MANA) > 0)
1041 addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.25 * HealthIncreaseRate);
1042 else
1043 addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.80 * HealthIncreaseRate);
1044 }
1045
1046 // Apply modifiers (if any).
1047 AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENT);
1048 for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
1049 AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
1050
1051 addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_REGEN) * CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1052
1053 ModifyHealth(addvalue);
1054}

void Creature::RemoveCorpse ( bool  setSpawnTime = true,

)
401{
402 if (getDeathState() != DeathState::Corpse)
403 return;
404
405 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
406 setDeathState(DeathState::Dead);

433}

◆ Respawn()

void Creature::Respawn ( bool  force = false)
Parameters
forceForce the respawn by killing the creature.
2036{
2037 if (force)
2038 {
2039 if (IsAlive())
2040 {
2041 setDeathState(DeathState::JustDied);
2042 }
2043 else if (getDeathState() != DeathState::Corpse)
2044 {
2045 setDeathState(DeathState::Corpse);
2046 }
2047 }
2048
2049 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_RESPAWN, GetEntry());
2050
2051 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(this, conditions) && !force)
2052 {
2053 // Creature should not respawn, reset respawn timer. Conditions will be checked again the next time it tries to respawn.
2054 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_respawnDelay;
2055 return;
2056 }
2057
2058 bool allowed = !IsAIEnabled || AI()->CanRespawn(); // First check if there are any scripts that prevent us respawning
2059 if (!allowed && !force) // Will be rechecked on next Update call
2060 return;
2061
2062 ObjectGuid dbtableHighGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(m_creatureData ? m_creatureData->id1 : GetEntry(), m_spawnId);
2063 time_t linkedRespawntime = GetMap()->GetLinkedRespawnTime(dbtableHighGuid);
2064
2065 CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(GetEntry());
2066
2067 if (!linkedRespawntime || (cInfo && cInfo->HasFlagsExtra(CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_HARD_RESET)) || force) // Should respawn
2068 {
2069 RemoveCorpse(false, false);
2070
2071 if (getDeathState() == DeathState::Dead)
2072 {
2073 if (m_spawnId)
2074 {
2075 GetMap()->RemoveCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
2076 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId);
2077 // Respawn check if spawn has 2 entries
2078 if (data->id2)
2079 {
2080 uint32 entry = GetRandomId(data->id1, data->id2, data->id3);
2081 UpdateEntry(entry, data, true); // Select Random Entry
2082 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(data->movementType); // Reload Movement Type
2083 LoadEquipment(data->equipmentId); // Reload Equipment
2084 AIM_Initialize(); // Reload AI
2085 }
2086 else
2087 {
2088 if (m_originalEntry != GetEntry())
2089 UpdateEntry(m_originalEntry);
2090 }
2091 }
2092
2093 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Respawning creature {} (SpawnId: {}, {})", GetName(), GetSpawnId(), GetGUID().ToString());
2094 m_respawnTime = 0;
2095 ResetPickPocketLootTime();
2096 loot.clear();
2097 SelectLevel();
2098
2099 m_respawnedTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2100 setDeathState(DeathState::JustRespawned);
2101
2102 // MDic - Acidmanifesto: Do not override transform auras
2103 if (GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM).empty())
2104 {
2105 CreatureModel display(GetNativeDisplayId(), GetNativeObjectScale(), 1.0f);
2106 CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&display, GetCreatureTemplate());
2107 if (minfo) // Cancel load if no model defined
2108 {
2109 SetDisplayId(display.CreatureDisplayID, display.DisplayScale);
2110 SetNativeDisplayId(display.CreatureDisplayID);
2111 }
2112 }
2113
2114 GetMotionMaster()->InitDefault();
2115
2116 //Call AI respawn virtual function
2117 if (IsAIEnabled)
2118 {
2119 //reset the AI to be sure no dirty or uninitialized values will be used till next tick
2120 AI()->Reset();
2121 TriggerJustRespawned = true; //delay event to next tick so all creatures are created on the map before processing
2122 }
2123
2124 uint32 poolid = m_spawnId ? sPoolMgr->IsPartOfAPool<Creature>(m_spawnId) : 0;
2125 if (poolid)
2126 sPoolMgr->UpdatePool<Creature>(poolid, m_spawnId);
2127
2128 //Re-initialize reactstate that could be altered by movementgenerators
2129 InitializeReactState();
2130
2131 }
2132 m_respawnedTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2133 // xinef: relocate notifier, fixes npc appearing in corpse position after forced respawn (instead of spawn)
2134 m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f, 0.0f);
2135 UpdateObjectVisibility(false);
2136
2137 }
2138 else // the master is dead
2139 {
2140 ObjectGuid targetGuid = sObjectMgr->GetLinkedRespawnGuid(dbtableHighGuid);
2141 if (targetGuid == dbtableHighGuid) // if linking self, never respawn (check delayed to next day)
2142 {
2143 SetRespawnTime(DAY);
2144 }
2145 else
2146 {
2147 time_t now = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2148 m_respawnTime = (now > linkedRespawntime ? now : linkedRespawntime) + urand(5, MINUTE); // else copy time from master and add a little
2149 }
2150 SaveRespawnTime(); // also save to DB immediately
2151 }
2152}

1394{
1395 // this should only be used when the creature has already been loaded
1396 // preferably after adding to map, because mapid may not be valid otherwise
1397 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId);

1400 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::SaveToDB failed, cannot get creature data!");
1401 return;

1406}

1409{
1410 // update in loaded data
1411 if (!m_spawnId)
1412 m_spawnId = sObjectMgr->GenerateCreatureSpawnId();
1413
1414 CreatureData& data = sObjectMgr->NewOrExistCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1415
1416 uint32 displayId = GetNativeDisplayId();
1417 uint32 npcflag = GetNpcFlags();
1418 uint32 unit_flags = GetUnitFlags();
1419 uint32 dynamicflags = GetDynamicFlags();
1420
1421 // check if it's a custom model and if not, use 0 for displayId
1422 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1423 if (cinfo)
1424 {
1425 for (CreatureModel model : cinfo->Models)
1426 if (displayId && displayId == model.CreatureDisplayID)
1427 displayId = 0;
1428
1429 if (npcflag == cinfo->npcflag)
1430 npcflag = 0;
1431
1432 if (unit_flags == cinfo->unit_flags)
1433 unit_flags = 0;
1434
1435 if (dynamicflags == cinfo->dynamicflags)
1436 dynamicflags = 0;
1437 }
1438
1439 data.id1 = GetEntry();
1440 data.mapid = mapid;
1441 data.phaseMask = phaseMask;
1442 data.displayid = displayId;
1443 data.equipmentId = GetCurrentEquipmentId();
1444 if (!GetTransport())
1445 {
1446 data.posX = GetPositionX();
1447 data.posY = GetPositionY();
1448 data.posZ = GetPositionZ();
1449 data.orientation = GetOrientation();
1450 }
1451 else
1452 {
1453 data.posX = GetTransOffsetX();
1454 data.posY = GetTransOffsetY();
1455 data.posZ = GetTransOffsetZ();
1456 data.orientation = GetTransOffsetO();
1457 }
1458
1459 data.spawntimesecs = m_respawnDelay;
1460 // prevent add data integrity problems
1461 data.wander_distance = GetDefaultMovementType() == IDLE_MOTION_TYPE ? 0.0f : m_wanderDistance;
1462 data.currentwaypoint = 0;
1463 data.curhealth = GetHealth();
1464 data.curmana = GetPower(POWER_MANA);
1465 // prevent add data integrity problems
1466 data.movementType = !m_wanderDistance && GetDefaultMovementType() == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE
1467 ? IDLE_MOTION_TYPE : GetDefaultMovementType();
1468 data.spawnMask = spawnMask;
1469 data.npcflag = npcflag;
1470 data.unit_flags = unit_flags;
1471 data.dynamicflags = dynamicflags;
1472
1473 // update in DB
1474 WorldDatabaseTransaction trans = WorldDatabase.BeginTransaction();
1475
1476 WorldDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_CREATURE);
1477 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1478 trans->Append(stmt);
1479
1480 uint8 index = 0;
1481
1482 stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_INS_CREATURE);
1483 stmt->SetData(index++, m_spawnId);
1484 stmt->SetData(index++, GetEntry());
1485 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1486 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1487 stmt->SetData(index++, uint16(mapid));
1488 stmt->SetData(index++, spawnMask);
1489 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPhaseMask());
1490 stmt->SetData(index++, int32(GetCurrentEquipmentId()));
1491 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionX());
1492 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionY());
1493 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionZ());
1494 stmt->SetData(index++, GetOrientation());
1495 stmt->SetData(index++, m_respawnDelay);
1496 stmt->SetData(index++, m_wanderDistance);
1497 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1498 stmt->SetData(index++, GetHealth());
1499 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPower(POWER_MANA));
1500 stmt->SetData(index++, uint8(GetDefaultMovementType()));
1501 stmt->SetData(index++, npcflag);
1502 stmt->SetData(index++, unit_flags);
1503 stmt->SetData(index++, dynamicflags);
1504 trans->Append(stmt);
1505
1506 WorldDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
1507 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureSaveToDB(this);
1508}

◆ SearchFormation()

void Creature::SearchFormation ( )
381{
382 if (IsSummon())
383 {
384 return;
385 }
386
387 ObjectGuid::LowType spawnId = GetSpawnId();
388 if (!spawnId)
389 {
390 return;
391 }
392
393 CreatureGroupInfoType::const_iterator frmdata = sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.find(spawnId);
394 if (frmdata != sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.end())
395 {
396 sFormationMgr->AddCreatureToGroup(frmdata->second.leaderGUID, this);
397 }
398}

void Creature::SelectLevel ( bool  changelevel = true)

: set UNIT_FIELD_POWER*, for some creature class case (energy, etc)
1511{
1512 CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1513
1514 uint32 rank = IsPet() ? 0 : cInfo->rank;
1515
1516 // level
1517 uint8 minlevel = std::min(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1518 uint8 maxlevel = std::max(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1519 uint8 level = minlevel == maxlevel ? minlevel : urand(minlevel, maxlevel);
1520
1521 sScriptMgr->OnBeforeCreatureSelectLevel(cInfo, this, level);
1522
1523 if (changelevel)
1524 SetLevel(level);
1525
1526 CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(level, cInfo->unit_class);
1527
1528 // health
1529 float healthmod = _GetHealthMod(rank);
1530
1531 uint32 basehp = std::max<uint32>(1, stats->GenerateHealth(cInfo));
1532 uint32 health = uint32(basehp * healthmod);
1533
1534 SetCreateHealth(health);
1535 SetMaxHealth(health);
1536 SetHealth(health);
1537 ResetPlayerDamageReq();
1538
1539 // mana

1541

1543 SetMaxPower(POWER_MANA, mana); //MAX Mana

1545
1547

1549 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_MANA, BASE_VALUE, (float)mana);
1550
1551 // damage
1552

1554
1555 float weaponBaseMinDamage = basedamage;
1556 float weaponBaseMaxDamage = basedamage * 1.5;
1557
1558 SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1559 SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);

1566

1569
1570 sScriptMgr->Creature_SelectLevel(cInfo, this);
1571}

◆ SelectNearestTargetInAttackDistance()

Unit * Creature::SelectNearestTargetInAttackDistance ( float  dist) const

Select nearest hostile unit within the given attack distance (i.e. distance is ignored if > than ATTACK_DISTANCE), regardless of threat list.

2407{
2408 if (dist < ATTACK_DISTANCE)
2409 dist = ATTACK_DISTANCE;
2410 if (dist > MAX_SEARCHER_DISTANCE)
2411 dist = MAX_SEARCHER_DISTANCE;
2412
2413 Unit* target = nullptr;
2414 Acore::NearestHostileUnitInAttackDistanceCheck u_check(this, dist);
2415 Acore::UnitLastSearcher<Acore::NearestHostileUnitInAttackDistanceCheck> searcher(this, target, u_check);
2416 Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, std::max(dist, ATTACK_DISTANCE));
2417
2418 return target;
2419}

◆ SelectVictim()

Unit * Creature::SelectVictim ( )
14734{
14735 // function provides main threat functionality
14736 // next-victim-selection algorithm and evade mode are called
14737 // threat list sorting etc.
14738
14739 Unit* target = nullptr;
14740
14741 // First checking if we have some taunt on us
14742 AuraEffectList const& tauntAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT);
14743 if (!tauntAuras.empty())
14744 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_reverse_iterator itr = tauntAuras.rbegin(); itr != tauntAuras.rend(); ++itr)
14745 if (Unit* caster = (*itr)->GetCaster())
14746 if (CanCreatureAttack(caster) && !caster->HasAuraTypeWithCaster(SPELL_AURA_IGNORED, GetGUID()))
14747 {
14748 target = caster;
14749 break;
14750 }
14751
14752 if (CanHaveThreatList())
14753 {
14754 if (!target && !m_ThreatMgr.isThreatListEmpty())
14755 target = m_ThreatMgr.getHostileTarget();
14756 }
14757 else if (!HasReactState(REACT_PASSIVE))
14758 {
14759 // we have player pet probably
14760 target = getAttackerForHelper();
14761 if (!target && IsSummon())
14762 if (Unit* owner = ToTempSummon()->GetOwner())
14763 {
14764 if (owner->IsInCombat())
14765 target = owner->getAttackerForHelper();
14766 if (!target)
14767 for (ControlSet::const_iterator itr = owner->m_Controlled.begin(); itr != owner->m_Controlled.end(); ++itr)
14768 if ((*itr)->IsInCombat())
14769 {
14770 target = (*itr)->getAttackerForHelper();
14771 if (target)
14772 break;
14773 }
14774 }
14775 }
14776 else
14777 return nullptr;
14778
14779 if (target && CanCreatureAttack(target))
14780 {
14781 SetInFront(target);
14782 return target;
14783 }
14784
14785 // last case when creature must not go to evade mode:
14786 // it in combat but attacker not make any damage and not enter to aggro radius to have record in threat list
14787 // Note: creature does not have targeted movement generator but has attacker in this case
14788 for (AttackerSet::const_iterator itr = m_attackers.begin(); itr != m_attackers.end(); ++itr)
14789 if ((*itr) && CanCreatureAttack(*itr) && !(*itr)->IsPlayer() && !(*itr)->ToCreature()->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_CONTROLABLE_GUARDIAN))
14790 return nullptr;
14791
14792 if (GetVehicle())
14793 return nullptr;
14794
14795 // pussywizard: not sure why it's here
14796 // pussywizard: can't evade when having invisibility aura with duration? o_O
14797 Unit::AuraEffectList const& iAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY);
14798 if (!iAuras.empty())
14799 {
14800 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = iAuras.begin(); itr != iAuras.end(); ++itr)
14801 if ((*itr)->GetBase()->IsPermanent())
14802 {
14803 AI()->EnterEvadeMode(CreatureAI::EVADE_REASON_NO_HOSTILES);
14804 break;
14805 }
14806 return nullptr;
14807 }
14808
14809 // Last chance: creature group
14810 if (CreatureGroup* group = GetFormation())
14811 {
14812 if (Unit* groupTarget = group->GetNewTargetForMember(this))
14813 {
14814 SetInFront(groupTarget);
14815 return groupTarget;
14816 }
14817 }
14818
14819 // enter in evade mode in other case
14820 AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
14821
14822 return nullptr;
14823}

◆ SetCanFly()

bool Creature::SetCanFly ( bool  enable,
bool  packetOnly = false 
)
overridevirtual

Add the movement flag: MOVEMENTFLAGCAN_FLY. Generaly only use by players, allowing them to fly by pressing space for example. For creatures, please look for DisableGravity().

Doesn't inform the client.

movement counter

◆ setDeathState()

void Creature::setDeathState ( DeathState  state,
bool  despawn = false 
)
overridevirtual

A creature can be in 4 different states: Alive, JustDied, Corpse, and JustRespawned. The cycle follows the next order:

  • Alive: The creature is alive and has spawned in the world
  • JustDied: The creature has just died. This is the state just before his body appeared
  • Corpse: The creature has been removed from the world, and this corpse has been spawned
  • JustRespawned: The creature has just respawned. Follow when the corpse disappears and the respawn timer is finished
Parameters
stateSpecify one of 4 states above
despawnDespawn the creature immediately, without waiting for any movement to finish

Reimplemented from Unit.

Reimplemented in Minion, and Pet.

1966{
1967 Unit::setDeathState(state, despawn);
1968
1969 if (state == DeathState::JustDied)
1970 {
1971 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_corpseDelay;
1972 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_respawnDelay + m_corpseDelay;
1973
1974 // always save boss respawn time at death to prevent crash cheating
1975 if (GetMap()->IsDungeon() || isWorldBoss() || GetCreatureTemplate()->rank >= CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE)
1976 SaveRespawnTime();
1977
1978 SetTarget(); // remove target selection in any cases (can be set at aura remove in Unit::setDeathState)
1979 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_NONE);
1980
1981 Dismount(); // if creature is mounted on a virtual mount, remove it at death
1982
1983 setActive(false);
1984
1985 if (HasSearchedAssistance())
1986 {
1987 SetNoSearchAssistance(false);
1988 }
1989
1990 //Dismiss group if is leader
1991 if (m_formation && m_formation->GetLeader() == this)
1992 m_formation->FormationReset(true, false);
1993
1994 bool needsFalling = !despawn && (IsFlying() || IsHovering()) && !IsUnderWater();
1995 SetHover(false, false, false);
1996 SetDisableGravity(false, false, false);
1997
1998 if (needsFalling)
1999 GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall(0, true);
2000
2001 Unit::setDeathState(DeathState::Corpse, despawn);
2002 }
2003 else if (state == DeathState::JustRespawned)
2004 {
2005 SetFullHealth();
2006 SetLootRecipient(nullptr);
2007 ResetPlayerDamageReq();
2008 SetCannotReachTarget();
2009 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
2010 // Xinef: npc run by default
2011 //SetWalk(true);
2012
2013 // pussywizard:
2014 if (HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING))
2015 RemoveUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING);
2016
2017 UpdateMovementFlags();
2018
2019 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(cinfo->npcflag));

2021 SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cinfo->dmgschool));
2022
2023 Unit::setDeathState(DeathState::Alive, despawn);
2024
2025 Motion_Initialize();
2026 LoadCreaturesAddon(true);

2028 SetPhaseMask(GetCreatureData()->phaseMask, false);
2029 }
2030}

◆ SetDisableGravity()

bool Creature::SetDisableGravity ( bool  disable,
bool  packetOnly = false,
bool  updateAnimationTier = true 
)
overridevirtual

Enable or disable the creature's fly mode by adding or removing: MOVEMENTFLAG_FLYING. Infom also the client.

It's possible only a packet is sent but moveflags are not updated Need more research on this

movement counter

Reimplemented from Unit.

3206{
3209 if (!packetOnly && !Unit::SetDisableGravity(disable))
3210 return false;
3211
3212 if (m_movedByPlayer)
3213 {
3214 WorldPacket data(disable ? SMSG_MOVE_GRAVITY_DISABLE : SMSG_MOVE_GRAVITY_ENABLE, 12);

3222 m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SendMessageToSet(&data, false);
3223 return true;
3224 }

3227 {
3228 if (IsLevitating())

3231 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_HOVER);

3234 }

◆ SetLootRecipient()

void Creature::SetLootRecipient ( Unit *  unit,
bool  withGroup = true 
)
1321{
1322 // set the player whose group should receive the right
1323 // to loot the creature after it dies
1324 // should be set to nullptr after the loot disappears
1325
1326 if (!unit)
1327 {
1328 m_lootRecipient.Clear();
1329 m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1330 RemoveDynamicFlag(UNIT_DYNFLAG_LOOTABLE | UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1331 ResetAllowedLooters();
1332 return;
1333 }
1334
1335 Player* player = unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1336 if (!player) // normal creature, no player involved
1337 return;
1338
1339 m_lootRecipient = player->GetGUID();
1340
1341 Map* map = GetMap();
1342 if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1343 {
1344 AddAllowedLooter(m_lootRecipient);
1345 }
1346
1347 if (withGroup)
1348 {
1349 if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
1350 {
1351 m_lootRecipientGroup = group->GetGUID().GetCounter();
1352
1353 if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1354 {
1355 Map::PlayerList const& PlayerList = map->GetPlayers();
1356 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = PlayerList.begin(); i != PlayerList.end(); ++i)
1357 {
1358 if (Player* groupMember = i->GetSource())
1359 {
1360 if (groupMember->IsGameMaster() || groupMember->IsSpectator())
1361 {
1362 continue;
1363 }
1364
1365 if (groupMember->GetGroup() == group)
1366 {
1367 AddAllowedLooter(groupMember->GetGUID());
1368 }
1369 }
1370 }
1371 }
1372 }
1373 }
1374 else
1375 m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1376
1377 SetDynamicFlag(UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1378}

◆ SetReactState()

void Creature::SetReactState ( ReactStates  state)
inline

A creature can have 3 ReactStates : Agressive, Passive, Neutral.

  • Agressive : The creature will attack any non friend units in sight
  • Passive : The creature will not attack anyone
  • Neutral : The creature will attack only if attacked
94{ m_reactState = state; }

References m_reactState.

◆ SetWaterWalking()

bool Creature::SetWaterWalking ( bool  enable,
bool  packetOnly = false 
)
overridevirtual

Allow to walk on water. Doesn't inform the client. Need to use SendMovementWaterWalking() if it's for players.

movement counter

Reimplemented from Unit.

3321{
3322 if (!packetOnly && !Unit::SetWaterWalking(enable))
3323 return false;
3324

3326 {
3327 WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_MOVE_WATER_WALK : SMSG_MOVE_LAND_WALK, 12);
3328 data << GetPackGUID();
3329 data << uint32(0);
3330 m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SendDirectMessage(&data);

3333 data << GetPackGUID();
3334 BuildMovementPacket(&data);
3335 m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SendMessageToSet(&data, false);
3336 return true;
3337 }

3342 return true;

◆ Update()

void Creature::Update ( uint32  time)
overridevirtual

Reimplemented from WorldObject.

Reimplemented in Pet, TempSummon, Puppet, and Totem.

660{
661 if (IsAIEnabled && TriggerJustRespawned)
662 {
663 TriggerJustRespawned = false;
664 AI()->JustRespawned();
665 if (m_vehicleKit)
666 m_vehicleKit->Reset();
667 }
668
669 switch (m_deathState)
670 {
671 case DeathState::JustRespawned:
672 // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_RESPAWNED -> ALIVE promoting.
673 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature ({}) in wrong state: DeathState::JustRespawned (4)", GetGUID().ToString());
674 break;
675 case DeathState::JustDied:
676 // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_DIED -> CORPSE promoting.
677 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature ({}) in wrong state: DeathState::JustDead (1)", GetGUID().ToString());
678 break;
679 case DeathState::Dead:
680 {
681 time_t now = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
682 if (m_respawnTime <= now)
683 {
684 Respawn();
685 }
686 break;
687 }
688 case DeathState::Corpse:
689 {
690 Unit::Update(diff);
691 // deathstate changed on spells update, prevent problems
692 if (m_deathState != DeathState::Corpse)
693 break;
694
695 if (m_groupLootTimer && lootingGroupLowGUID)
696 {
697 if (m_groupLootTimer <= diff)
698 {
699 Group* group = sGroupMgr->GetGroupByGUID(lootingGroupLowGUID);
700 if (group)
701 group->EndRoll(&loot, GetMap());
702 m_groupLootTimer = 0;
703 lootingGroupLowGUID = 0;
704 }
705 else
706 {
707 m_groupLootTimer -= diff;
708 }
709 }
710 else if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= GameTime::GetGameTime().count())
711 {
712 RemoveCorpse(false);
713 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Removing corpse... {} ", GetUInt32Value(OBJECT_FIELD_ENTRY));
714 }
715 break;
716 }
717 case DeathState::Alive:
718 {
719 Unit::Update(diff);
720
721 // creature can be dead after Unit::Update call
722 // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
723 if (!IsAlive())
724 break;
725
726 // if creature is charmed, switch to charmed AI
727 if (NeedChangeAI)
728 {
729 UpdateCharmAI();
730 NeedChangeAI = false;
731 IsAIEnabled = true;
732
733 // xinef: update combat state, if npc is not in combat - return to spawn correctly by calling EnterEvadeMode
734 SelectVictim();
735 }
736
737 // if periodic combat pulse is enabled and we are both in combat and in a dungeon, do this now
738 if (m_combatPulseDelay > 0 && IsInCombat() && GetMap()->IsDungeon())
739 {
740 if (diff > m_combatPulseTime)
741 m_combatPulseTime = 0;
742 else
743 m_combatPulseTime -= diff;
744
745 if (m_combatPulseTime == 0)
746 {
747 if (AI())
748 AI()->DoZoneInCombat();
749 else
750 SetInCombatWithZone();
751 m_combatPulseTime = m_combatPulseDelay * IN_MILLISECONDS;
752 }
753 }
754
755 // periodic check to see if the creature has passed an evade boundary
756 if (IsAIEnabled && !IsInEvadeMode() && IsEngaged())
757 {
758 if (diff >= m_boundaryCheckTime)
759 {
760 AI()->CheckInRoom();
761 m_boundaryCheckTime = 2500;
762 }
763 else
764 m_boundaryCheckTime -= diff;
765 }
766
767 Unit* owner = GetCharmerOrOwner();
768 if (IsCharmed() && !IsWithinDistInMap(owner, GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange(), true, false))
769 {
770 RemoveCharmAuras();
771 }
772
773 if (Unit* victim = GetVictim())
774 {
775 // If we are closer than 50% of the combat reach we are going to reposition the victim
776 if (diff >= m_moveBackwardsMovementTime)
777 {
778 float MaxRange = GetCollisionRadius() + GetVictim()->GetCollisionRadius();
779
780 if (IsInDist(victim, MaxRange))
781 AI()->MoveBackwardsChecks();
782
783 m_moveBackwardsMovementTime = urand(MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL * 3);
784 }
785 else
786 {
787 m_moveBackwardsMovementTime -= diff;
788 }
789
790 // Circling the target
791 if (diff >= m_moveCircleMovementTime)
792 {
793 AI()->MoveCircleChecks();
794 m_moveCircleMovementTime = urand(MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL * 2);
795 }
796 else
797 {
798 m_moveCircleMovementTime -= diff;
799 }
800 }
801
802 // Call for assistance if not disabled
803 if (m_assistanceTimer)
804 {
805 if (m_assistanceTimer <= diff)
806 {
807 if (CanPeriodicallyCallForAssistance())
808 {
809 SetNoCallAssistance(false);
810 CallAssistance();
811 }
812 m_assistanceTimer = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_PERIOD);
813 }
814 else
815 {
816 m_assistanceTimer -= diff;
817 }
818 }
819
820 if (!IsInEvadeMode() && IsAIEnabled)
821 {
822 // do not allow the AI to be changed during update
823 m_AI_locked = true;
824 i_AI->UpdateAI(diff);
825 m_AI_locked = false;
826 }
827
828 // creature can be dead after UpdateAI call
829 // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
830 if (!IsAlive())
831 break;
832
833 m_regenTimer -= diff;
834 if (m_regenTimer <= 0)
835 {
836 if (!IsInEvadeMode())
837 {
838 // regenerate health if not in combat or if polymorphed)
839 if (!IsInCombat() || IsPolymorphed())
840 RegenerateHealth();
841 else if (IsNotReachableAndNeedRegen())
842 {
843 // regenerate health if cannot reach the target and the setting is set to do so.
844 // this allows to disable the health regen of raid bosses if pathfinding has issues for whatever reason
845 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_REGEN_HP_CANNOT_REACH_TARGET_IN_RAID) || !GetMap()->IsRaid())
846 {
847 RegenerateHealth();
848 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() enabled because Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: {}", GetDebugInfo());
849 }
850 else
851 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() disabled even if the Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: {}", GetDebugInfo());
852 }
853 }
854
855 if (getPowerType() == POWER_ENERGY)
856 Regenerate(POWER_ENERGY);
857 else
858 Regenerate(POWER_MANA);
859
860 m_regenTimer += CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL;
861 }
862
863 if (CanNotReachTarget() && !IsInEvadeMode())
864 {
865 m_cannotReachTimer += diff;
866 if (m_cannotReachTimer >= (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_NPC_EVADE_IF_NOT_REACHABLE) * IN_MILLISECONDS))
867 {
868 Player* cannotReachPlayer = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*this, m_cannotReachTarget);
869 if (cannotReachPlayer && IsEngagedBy(cannotReachPlayer) && IsAIEnabled && AI()->OnTeleportUnreacheablePlayer(cannotReachPlayer))
870 {
871 SetCannotReachTarget();
872 }
873 else if (!GetMap()->IsRaid())
874 {
875 auto EnterEvade = [&]()
876 {
877 if (CreatureAI* ai = AI())
878 {
879 ai->EnterEvadeMode(CreatureAI::EvadeReason::EVADE_REASON_NO_PATH);
880 }
881 };
882
883 if (GetThreatMgr().GetThreatListSize() <= 1)
884 {
885 EnterEvade();
886 }
887 else
888 {
889 if (HostileReference* ref = GetThreatMgr().GetOnlineContainer().getReferenceByTarget(m_cannotReachTarget))
890 {
891 ref->removeReference();
892 SetCannotReachTarget();
893 }
894 else
895 {
896 EnterEvade();
897 }
898 }
899 }
900 }
901 }
902 break;
903 }
904 default:
905 break;
906 }
907
908 if (IsInWorld() && !IsDuringRemoveFromWorld())
909 {
910 // pussywizard:
911 if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
912 {
913 if (m_transportCheckTimer <= diff)
914 {
915 m_transportCheckTimer = 1000;
916 Transport* newTransport = GetMap()->GetTransportForPos(GetPhaseMask(), GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), this);
917 if (newTransport != GetTransport())
918 {
919 if (GetTransport())
920 GetTransport()->RemovePassenger(this, true);
921 if (newTransport)
922 newTransport->AddPassenger(this, true);
923 this->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
924 //SendMovementFlagUpdate();
925 }
926 }
927 else
928 m_transportCheckTimer -= diff;
929 }
930
931 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureUpdate(this, diff);
932 }
933}

◆ UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage()

void Creature::UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage ( bool  ranged = false)
