1060{
1061 UnitMods unitMod = ranged ? UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED : UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER;
1062
1063 uint16 index = UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER;
1064 uint16 indexMod = UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MODS;
1065 uint16 indexMulti = UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER;
1066
1067 if (ranged)
1068 {
1069 index = UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER;
1070 indexMod = UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MODS;
1071 indexMulti = UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER;
1072 }
1073
1074 float baseAttackPower = GetModifierValue(unitMod, BASE_VALUE) * GetModifierValue(unitMod, BASE_PCT);
1075 float attackPowerMod = GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_VALUE);
1076 float attackPowerMultiplier = GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT) - 1.0f;
1077
1078 SetInt32Value(index, uint32(baseAttackPower)); // UNIT_FIELD_(RANGED)_ATTACK_POWER
1079 SetInt32Value(indexMod, uint32(attackPowerMod)); // UNIT_FIELD_(RANGED)_ATTACK_POWER_MODS
1080 SetFloatValue(indexMulti, attackPowerMultiplier); // UNIT_FIELD_(RANGED)_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER
1081
1082 // automatically update weapon damage after attack power modification
1083 if (ranged)
1084 UpdateDamagePhysical(RANGED_ATTACK);
1085 else
1086 {
1087 UpdateDamagePhysical(BASE_ATTACK);
1088 UpdateDamagePhysical(OFF_ATTACK);
1089 }
1090}

◆ UpdateEntry() [2/2]

bool Creature::UpdateEntry ( uint32  entry,
const CreatureData *  data = nullptr,
bool  changelevel = true,
bool  updateAI = false 
)
540{
541 if (!InitEntry(Entry, data))
542 return false;
543
544 CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
545
546 m_regenHealth = cInfo->RegenHealth;
547
548 // creatures always have melee weapon ready if any unless specified otherwise
549 if (!GetCreatureAddon())
550 SetSheath(SHEATH_STATE_MELEE);
551
552 SetFaction(cInfo->faction);
553
554 uint32 npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags;
555 ObjectMgr::ChooseCreatureFlags(cInfo, npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags, data);
556
557 if (cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_WORLDEVENT)
558 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(npcflag | sGameEventMgr->GetNPCFlag(this)));
559 else
560 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(npcflag));
561
562 // Xinef: NPC is in combat, keep this flag!
563 unit_flags &= ~UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
564 if (IsInCombat())
565 unit_flags |= UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
566
567 ReplaceAllUnitFlags(UnitFlags(unit_flags));
568 ReplaceAllUnitFlags2(UnitFlags2(cInfo->unit_flags2));
569
570 ReplaceAllDynamicFlags(dynamicflags);
571
572 SetCanDualWield(cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_USE_OFFHAND_ATTACK);
573
574 SetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
575 SetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
576 SetAttackTime(RANGED_ATTACK, cInfo->RangeAttackTime);
577
578 uint32 previousHealth = GetHealth();
579 uint32 previousMaxHealth = GetMaxHealth();
580 uint32 previousPlayerDamageReq = _playerDamageReq;
581
582 SelectLevel(changelevel);
583 if (previousHealth > 0)
584 {
585 SetHealth(previousHealth);
586
587 if (previousMaxHealth && previousMaxHealth > GetMaxHealth())
588 {
589 _playerDamageReq = (uint32)(previousPlayerDamageReq * GetMaxHealth() / previousMaxHealth);
590 }
591 else
592 {
593 _playerDamageReq = previousPlayerDamageReq;
594 }
595 }
596
597 SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cInfo->dmgschool));
598 CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(GetLevel(), cInfo->unit_class);
599 float armor = stats->GenerateArmor(cInfo);
600 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, BASE_VALUE, armor);
601 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY]));
602 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FIRE]));
603 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_NATURE]));
604 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FROST]));
605 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_SHADOW]));
606 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE]));
607
608 SetCanModifyStats(true);
609 UpdateAllStats();
610
611 // checked and error show at loading templates
612 if (FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->faction))
613 {
614 if (factionTemplate->factionFlags & FACTION_TEMPLATE_FLAG_ASSIST_PLAYERS)
615 SetPvP(true);
616 else
617 SetPvP(false);
618 }
619
620 // updates spell bars for vehicles and set player's faction - should be called here, to overwrite faction that is set from the new template
621 if (IsVehicle())
622 {
623 if (Player* owner = Creature::GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself()) // this check comes in case we don't have a player
624 {
625 SetFaction(owner->GetFaction()); // vehicles should have same as owner faction
626 owner->VehicleSpellInitialize();
627 }
628 }
629
630 // trigger creature is always not selectable and can not be attacked
631 if (IsTrigger())
632 SetUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
633
634 InitializeReactState();
635
636 if (!IsPet() && cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_TAUNT)
637 {
638 ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_STATE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT, true);
639 ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, true);
640 }
641
642 SetDetectionDistance(cInfo->detection_range);
643
644 // Update movement
645 if (IsRooted())
646 SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
647 UpdateMovementFlags();
648
649 LoadSpellTemplateImmunity();
650
651 if (updateAI)
652 {
653 AIM_Initialize();
654 }
655
656 return true;
657}

◆ UpdateMoveInLineOfSightState()

void Creature::UpdateMoveInLineOfSightState ( )
2589{
2590 // xinef: pets, guardians and units with scripts / smartAI should be skipped
2591 if (IsPet() || HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_MINION | UNIT_MASK_SUMMON | UNIT_MASK_GUARDIAN | UNIT_MASK_CONTROLABLE_GUARDIAN) ||
2592 GetScriptId() || GetAIName() == "SmartAI")
2593 {
2594 m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled = false;
2595 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = false;
2596 return;
2597 }
2598
2599 if (IsTrigger() || IsCivilian() || GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET || IsCritter() || GetAIName() == "NullCreatureAI")
2600 {
2601 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = true;
2602 m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled = true;
2603 return;
2604 }
2605
2606 bool nonHostile = true;
2607 if (FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(GetFaction()))
2608 if (factionTemplate->hostileMask || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[0] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[1] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[2] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[3])
2609 nonHostile = false;
2610
2611 if (nonHostile)
2612 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = true;
2613 else
2614 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = false;
2615}

◆ UpdateMovementFlags()

void Creature::UpdateMovementFlags ( )
3437{
3438 // Do not update movement flags if creature is controlled by a player (charm/vehicle)
3439 if (m_movedByPlayer)
3440 return;
3441
3442 CreatureTemplate const* info = GetCreatureTemplate();
3443 if (!info)
3444 return;
3445
3446 // Creatures with CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE should control MovementFlags in your own scripts
3447 if (info->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE)
3448 return;
3449
3450 float ground = GetFloorZ();
3451
3452 bool canHover = CanHover();
3453 bool isInAir = (G3D::fuzzyGt(GetPositionZ(), ground + (canHover ? GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT) : 0.0f) + GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE) || G3D::fuzzyLt(GetPositionZ(), ground - GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE)); // Can be underground too, prevent the falling
3454
3455 if (GetMovementTemplate().IsFlightAllowed() && isInAir && !IsFalling())
3456 {
3457 if (GetMovementTemplate().Flight == CreatureFlightMovementType::CanFly)
3458 SetCanFly(true);
3459 else
3460 SetDisableGravity(true);
3461
3462 if (!HasHoverAura())
3463 SetHover(false);
3464 }
3465 else
3466 {
3467 SetCanFly(false);
3468 SetDisableGravity(false);
3469 if (IsAlive() && (CanHover() || HasHoverAura()))
3470 SetHover(true);
3471 }
3472
3473 if (!isInAir)
3474 RemoveUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING);
3475
3476 bool Swim = false;
3477 LiquidData const& liquidData = GetLiquidData();
3478 switch (liquidData.Status)
3479 {
3480 case LIQUID_MAP_WATER_WALK:
3481 case LIQUID_MAP_IN_WATER:
3482 Swim = GetPositionZ() - liquidData.DepthLevel > GetCollisionHeight() * 0.75f; // Shallow water at ~75% of collision height
3483 break;
3484 case LIQUID_MAP_UNDER_WATER:
3485 Swim = true;
3486 break;
3487 default:
3488 break;
3489 }
3490
3491 SetSwim(CanSwim() && Swim);
3492}
GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE
float const GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE
Definition: SharedDefines.h:26
LIQUID_MAP_UNDER_WATER
@ LIQUID_MAP_UNDER_WATER
Definition: Map.h:146

@ LIQUID_MAP_IN_WATER

LIQUID_MAP_WATER_WALK
@ LIQUID_MAP_WATER_WALK
